resources.string: Attack is the time for the note to get to max volume Decay is time from max attack to sustain level Sustain is level when not is held for a long period Release is how long for volume to go down as it is released.
LFO rate is the speed of the low frequency wave that can affect the pitch or the filter LFO Filt is how much it affects the filter LFO pitch how much it affects oscillator
Delay and reverb sound good with the drone experiment
To play Drone press drone button then select your note. To go to a different octave select the button for it.
